freemarker.cache

类 FirstMatchTemplateConfigurationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • freemarker.cache.TemplateConfigurationFactory
      • freemarker.cache.FirstMatchTemplateConfigurationFactory

  • public class FirstMatchTemplateConfigurationFactory
extends TemplateConfigurationFactory
    Returns the first non-null result of the child factories, ignoring all further child factories. The child factories are called in the order as they were added.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      FirstMatchTemplateConfigurationFactory(TemplateConfigurationFactory... templateConfigurationFactories)

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        public TemplateConfiguration get(String sourceName,
                                 Object templateSource)
                          throws IOException,
                                 TemplateConfigurationFactoryException
        从类复制的说明: TemplateConfigurationFactory
        Returns (maybe creates) the TemplateConfiguration for the given template source.
        指定者:
        get 在类中 TemplateConfigurationFactory
        参数:
        sourceName - The name (path) that was used for TemplateLoader.findTemplateSource(String). See Template.getSourceName() for details.
        templateSource - The object returned by TemplateLoader.findTemplateSource(String).
        返回:
        The TemplateConfiguration to apply, or null if the there's no TemplateConfiguration for this template source.
        抛出:
        IOException - Typically, if there factory needs further I/O to find out more about the template source, but that fails.
        TemplateConfigurationFactoryException - If there's a problem that's specific to the factory logic.

      • getAllowNoMatch

        public boolean getAllowNoMatch()
        Getter pair of setAllowNoMatch(boolean).

      • setAllowNoMatch

        public void setAllowNoMatch(boolean allowNoMatch)
        Use this to specify if having no matching choice is an error. The default is false, that is, it's an error if there was no matching choice.
        另请参阅:
        setNoMatchErrorDetails(String)

      • getNoMatchErrorDetails

        public String getNoMatchErrorDetails()
        Use this to specify the text added to the exception error message when there was no matching choice. The default is null (no error details).
        另请参阅:
        setAllowNoMatch(boolean)

      • setNoMatchErrorDetails

        public void setNoMatchErrorDetails(String noMatchErrorDetails)

      • allowNoMatch

        public FirstMatchTemplateConfigurationFactory allowNoMatch(boolean allow)
        Same as setAllowNoMatch(boolean), but return this object to support "fluent API" style.

      • noMatchErrorDetails

        public FirstMatchTemplateConfigurationFactory noMatchErrorDetails(String message)
        Same as setNoMatchErrorDetails(String), but return this object to support "fluent API" style.

      • setConfigurationOfChildren

        protected void setConfigurationOfChildren(Configuration cfg)
        从类复制的说明: TemplateConfigurationFactory
        Calls TemplateConfiguration.setParentConfiguration(Configuration) on each enclosed TemplateConfiguration and TemplateConfigurationFactory.setConfiguration(Configuration) on each enclosed TemplateConfigurationFactory objects. It only supposed to call these on the direct "children" of this object, not on the children of the children.
        指定者:
        setConfigurationOfChildren 在类中 TemplateConfigurationFactory
